item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI says it has evidence China’s DeepSeek used its model to train competitor
2. Musk clashed with Tangen over Norway oil fund’s vote against Tesla pay
3. US judge blocks Trump’s plan to freeze federal grants and loans
4. [Opinion] Trump and the Dr Strangelove experiment
5. Santander’s UK chair William Vereker resigns after rift with Ana Botín
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, January 29, 2025 at 1:20 PM UTC
